quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First step, go to the east. And then, attempt to head south. With that accomplished, take a trip south. With that accomplished, go west. Following that, attempt to venture west. Next, make an attempt to venture south. If you can succeed at that, attempt to go west. If you can succeed at that, lift the Microsoft limited edition key from the floor of the study. And then, go to the north. And then, insert the Microsoft limited edition key into the Microsoft limited edition door's lock to unlock it. Then, open the Microsoft limited edition door in the bathroom. And then, head east. Then, attempt to take a trip south. Then, lift the passkey from the floor of the kitchenette. Got that? Good!
commands: unlock Microsoft limited edition door with Microsoft limited edition key
unlock Microsoft limited edition door with Microsoft limited edition key

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a workshop. An ordinary kind of place. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You can see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] portmanteau.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_0]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The portmanteau is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You arrive in a pantry. A typical kind of place.

 Look over there! a counter. [if there is something on the s_0]On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_0]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]The counter appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. A normal kind of place. The room is well lit.

 You can see a trunk.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The trunk is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a studio. A standard kind of place.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. An ordinary one.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a coffer. Huh, weird.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The coffer is empty![end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a locker.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You've entered a salon.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a basket. Huh, weird.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The basket is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You see a stand. [if there is something on the s_1]On the stand you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty. You swear loudly.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You've entered a parlor.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the recreation zone. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You are in a launderette. A standard one. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can make out a drawer.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_5]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The drawer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a safe.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a shelf. The shelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the shelf you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] Microsoft limited edition door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just come into a bathroom.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] Microsoft limited edition door leading east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a kitchenette, cool, but is it normal? You better believe it is.

 You make out a chest.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

Well, here we are in a study. The room is well lit.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

 You see [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The box contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cubicle. An usual one.

 You can make out a display, so there's that.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The display contains [a list of things in the c_10], so there's that.[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The display is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] suitcase.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] What a letdown! The suitcase is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: serious study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. A serious one.

 You can see a chair. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a chair, go to TextWorld. The chair is usual.[if there is something on the s_3] On the chair you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You're now in a bar. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You see [if c_11 is locked]a locked[else if c_11 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_11], so there's that.[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] What a letdown! The dresser is empty![end if] You make out a recliner. [if there is something on the s_4]On the recliner you can make out [a list of things on the s_4]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchen. A typical kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a vault.

 You can make out a table. The table is normal.[if there is something on the s_5] On the table you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a canteen. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: austere office
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered an austere office.

 You can make out a mantle. The mantle is typical.[if there is something on the s_6] On the mantle you can make out [a list of things on the s_6]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You can make out a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is usual.[if there is something on the s_7] On the mantelpiece you make out [a list of things on the s_7]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] However, the mantelpiece, like an empty mantelpiece, has nothing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to make an attempt to go east. Then, make an effort to go to the south. After that, attempt to head south. After that, take a trip west. Then, try to take a trip west. Once you manage that, try to take a trip south. With that done, pick up the passkey from the floor of the kitchenette. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
